lyrics:
Don't need a lover who's a mystery 
I want somebody who can talk to me 
Don't need someone just putting on a show 
You started something baby don't let go 

Don't make me wait too long for your reply 
(Don't make me wait too long) 
You ought to know that you don't have to hide 
Tell me you're ready boy look in my eyes 

Chorus:
Baby put your love on me 
Just open up, don't play hide and seek 
Show me so that I can see 
What's on your mind? Don't play hide and seek 

Like when you want me and you let me know 
Like when you hold me and you don't let go 
Each time I see you walking through my door 
I feel the passion growing more and more 

Don't make me wait around for your reply 
(Don't make me wait around) 
Make up your mind boy, don't you move too slow 
Tell me you want my love come on let go 

(Chorus 2x) 

When we touch 
I feel this strong attraction 
You know I felt it from the start 
And when we kiss it starts a chain reaction 
And it's burning its way straight to my heart

Break

Don't make me wait too long for your reply 
(Don't make me wait too long) 
You ought to know that you don't have to hide 
Tell me you're ready boy look in my eyes 

(Chorus 4x)
